## IMathMatrix.DeleteColumn 方法

删除指定的列

```csharp
public void DeleteColumn(int columnIndex)
```

| 参数 | 类型 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| columnIndex | Int32 | 要删除的列的零基索引。 |

### 示例

示例:

```csharp
[C#]
IMathMatrix matrix = new MathMatrix(2, 3);
matrix.DeleteColumn(0);
```
